MPR Associates, Inc.

Personalized customer service:

"When we partner with JD Franz Research, top experts in the

firm roll up their sleeves to work on our project from start to finish.

There are no unexpected surprises of

tasks being delegated to less experienced staff."

- - -

Quality of work:

"For over a decade, JD Franz Research has conducted customer satisfaction surveys that are a critical part of our organization’s performance metrics. This is why we expect the research to be administered in the most methodologically sound way

and the data to be of impeccable quality. The JD Franz Research team has delivered just that."

- - -

Market Research Specialist,

Sacramento Municipal Utility District
